name: Catch the Cat (Kakumei no  Heiko)
description:
You don't remember anything, and yet, you are so high that you feel like an alien.

All of sudden, dozens of cats appeared in front of you. You feel a strong desire to catch them all, as if it was your destiny  to become a Catmon Master.

However, the path you choose is not so easy.

Everytime you catch a cat, another one appears.

Now, I ask you: who shall win?

You (motivated) or a game who spawns a new cat every single time you catch one?
